messages.title: VOTE FOR CHANGE
messages.content: We cannot afford five more years of Gordon Brown

messages.title: TAKING ACTION ON LOCAL ISSUES
messages.content: Here are some of the campaigns Steve wants to take to Westminster

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Attract new businesses and jobs to North East Cambridgeshire, improve transport infrastructure, support existing firms, and upskill the workforce.
Issue-based meetings with executives such as with the Chief Executive of Network Rail and addressing rural issues.
Conservative will increase health care provision, reduce reliance on hospital transfers, and ensure more people have access to an NHS dentist.
Steve Barclay supports more sports and play equipment, better opportunities for young people to volunteer, and improving facilities for teenagers.

issues.economy: Only Conservatives can change this Labour Government which has run up massive debts.
issues.governance: Government wastes £23 million on Fire HQ, highlights the need for better funding decisions.
issues.health: Majority have no access to NHS dentists here, Conservative will increase health care provision.
issues.immigration: Labour has failed to display a proper strategy on immigration and border control.

housing.content: Empty buildings like Wisbech Magistrates Court and the College should be brought back into use rather than left to stand empty at taxpayer's expense.

endorsements.endorsement: Malcolm Moss MP gives Steve Barclay the Thumbs Up

leaflet.additionalNotes: This newspaper has not been paid for with any taxpayers' money.
